text: 1:11 Matyu 23:14; Jon 10:12; 1 Timoti 6:5; 2 Timoti 3:6; 1 Pita 5:2Gumazamizir kurar kaba arazir kuram damuva gumazamizibar biziba ko men dagɨaba uari bagh da iniasa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me arazir e damuan koghamibar men sure gami. Egha arazir kamɨn me gumazamizir mabar men adarazi sara, men nɨghnɨzir gavgavibagh asɨghasɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ me mɨkemeghtɨ me akar katam mɨkɨman markɨ.
